## Matrix3x3.rotation() method

Creates a Matrix3x3 that presents a rotation around a given axis.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static rotation(axis: Vector3, angle: number, result?: Matrix3x3): Matrix3x3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  axis | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The rotation axis. |
|  angle | number | The rotate angle in radians. |
|  result | [Matrix3x3](doc/markdown/./base.matrix3x3.md) | _(Optional)_ The output matrix, if not specified, a new matrix will be created. |

**Returns:**

[Matrix3x3](doc/markdown/./base.matrix3x3.md)

The output matrix
